_header: The valley hight Spoletan there Saint Francis was I-bore
Subjects: Francis of Assisi, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Francis in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Þe valeye hatte spoletan þer saint franceys was I
                    bore& þe toun assisie so þe bok vs telleþ
                    sore…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…þat on deyde amorwe þat oþer deyde an eue&
                    so hy gonnen boþe þis wrecched lif byleue
Bod779.Note:
Unique copy; ends imperfectly near top of page with rest of page
                    blank.
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 312-23.
